---
title: Read text corpora
engine: julia
---



```{julia}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| output: false
root = pwd()  |> dirname |> dirname |> dirname
using EditorsRepo
repo = joinpath(root, "test", "data", "splitdocs")
r = repository(repo)
```


Collect a corpus of normalized texts from the repository.


```{julia}
normalizedcorpus(r)
```
